The Radon Project
==============================

.. toctree::
   :hidden:
   :maxdepth: 1

   reference

The example project for the
`Hypermodern Python <https://medium.com/@cjolowicz/hypermodern-python-d44485d9d769>`_
article series.
The programm will perform radon tranform.


Installation
------------

To install the Radon project, copy `Trufanova Sofia's <https://github.com/SofiaTrufanova/Discrete_Radon>`_ repository and use poetry:

.. code-block:: console

   $ pip install poetry


Usage
-----

Radon's usage looks like:

.. code-block:: console

   $ poetry run radon_sofia
